title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: Supplied

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: kick-start your coding career with $1 Python ebooks, free Android game, get Outer Worlds on PC for $4.95 and more!

1. Learn to code on the cheap: Fanatical is better known for its PC gaming deals, but it's currently having a sale on programming ebooks which are going for as little as $1. You can also order a complete bundle valued at over $960 for just 15 bucks. Click here!

2. Free rent for a year: Leatherman is running a competition to win a year's worth of free rent (or $25,000's worth - whichever happens first.) To be in the running, all you have to do is explain in 25 words or less why you deserve to win. That's it! Click here to enter.

3. 20GB mobile plan for $18: Upstart telco Circles.Life has a crazy good SIM-only plan going at the moment. For a limited time, it's offering unlimited calls and 20GB of data per month for just $18. Click here for details! You can also see the inclusions here:

4. Free Android game: Who doesn't love a 100% gaming discount? You can currently get the fun Android cooking game Dr. Panda Restaurant for free - down from $5.99. Click here!

5. Pen sale: There are few things more satisfying in life than a fancy, high-quality pen. Catch is currently having a sale on this very products, with savings of up to $80! Click here.

6. Get The Outer Worlds on PC for $4.95: One of this year's most hotly anticipated RPGs - Outer Worlds - is now on sale in Australia. A retailer copy will set you back around $70 - or you can play it for $4.95 via Xbox Game Pass For PC. The catch is that you'll need to finish the game in one month but we imagine that's all you'll need. Click here!

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: kick-start your coding career with $1 Python ebooks, free Android game, get Outer Worlds on PC for $4.95 and more!...
